headline: Philip Morris Missile Strike Puts Ukraine Risks And Valuation In Focus
summary: Russian missiles struck Philip Morris International's Kharkiv manufacturing plant after operations there had already been halted due to the conflict in Ukraine. The attack highlights fresh operational and geopolitical risks for NYSE:PM's Ukrainian footprint and its plans for maintaining production in the country. The strike on the Kharkiv facility puts a sharper focus on how Philip Morris International, trading around $179.44, is exposed to conflict related disruptions in Ukraine. Investors...
